item.description:
It's that time of year for bump, set, and spike! The Brettl Hupfers Ski club is once again hosting their Summer Volleyball League on Wednesdays at Artesani park in Allston. Hope to see you there!!

The Brettl Hupfers Ski club is once again hosting their Summer Volleyball League in Wednesdays at Artesani park in Allston,

 

FREE PLAY /TEAM ASSIGNMENT & BASIC INSTRUCTION: May 30th and June 6th

REGULAR SEASON:  June 13th to August 8th.
July 4th – will be an off night

10 Weeks of Play + Playoff Weekend

Level: Recreational

Location: Artesani Park located off Soldiers Field Rd in Brighton, MA from

Time: 6:15 – 8:30 Wednesday Night

Cost:  BHSC Member or EICSL $60; Individual Non-Member $65

Deadline June 6th. No refunds after June 7st

CHAMPIONSHIP WEEKEND: August 11-12th

 All league players will receive free lodging, cookout, and party at the Brettl-Hupfers Ski club in Bartlett, NH for the championship weekend. The winning team will receive prizes!

In case of rain, it will be postponed to August 18-19th with regular play on the 15th

Drills and Training:

We will have a professional volleyball instructor to do drills and work on team skills.  Each group of 2 teams will work with the instructor for a 45 minute session.

Payment Options:

1) By Check:

Send Check Payable to: Brettl- Hupfers’ Ski and Sports Club   

Mail To: Brettl-Hupfers’ Ski and Sport Club
C\O John Raeder
31 Linden Rd
West Roxbury, MA 02132

2) By Paypal:

A.  Go to: www.paypal.com (create an account if you don't already have one - and no, you do not have to give them your bank account info to make a payment).
B.  Send Money to: Treasurer@brettl.org add 3% if you are paying with a debit or credit card.  If your checking account is linked to paypal, no extra fees.
C.  Click "Personal" Click "Payment Owed"
D.  Please write in the subject field: Volleyball

 

LEAGUE DETAILS
• Nets and Equipment will all be Tournament grade
• Must be 21 Years of age
• Minimum of 3 Men and 3 Women per team maximum of 8 players
• Scoring will be Rally Point Style
• Play the whole time (No sitting out - No working)
• Registration will be taken on a first come first serve basis
• Players must play in at least half of the regular season games to be eligible to play in the playoffs
• Teams must have a minimum  of 2 Men and 2 Women for games to count towards standings

Directions & Parking to Artesani Park

From I-93 North or South and Boston
From Storrow Drive West follow signs reading "Newton/Arlington" (note Storrow Drive Becomes Soldiers Field Road about 3 miles into the journey). You will come to a sign reading 'Arlington/Route 2 Fresh Pond Parkway and Newton.' At the Flashing yellow light just ahead of this sign, bear left. Go through a traffic signal 20 yards ahead.  Go ½ mile along Soldiers Field Road. Enter the 2nd parking lot on your right. There will be a gazebo near the river, we play in field after it.

From the Massachusetts Turnpike (I-90 East or West)
Take the Allston/Cambridge exit; head in the Cambridge direction. One light after the Doubletree Guest Suites and before crossing the River Street Bridge turn left onto the service road which parallels Storrow Drive and the river. Follow the signs for 'Newton/Arlington'. Go through the Western Avenue Traffic light and under the yellow overhead sign reading 'Danger Low Clearance - Cars only' and onto Soldiers Field Road. Go 1 mile to the yellow flashing light described in the directions above to Artesani Parking lot.

Public Transportation
From Central Square take the #70 bus (outbound to Waltham).
From Cleveland Circle take the #86 bus
(toward Cambridge).
From Harvard Square take the #86 bus
(toward Brookline)

Exit any of these buses at the corner of Western Avenue and Everett Street (382 Western Avenue). Then walk toward the Days Hotel and through the Hotel parking lot to Soldiers Field Road. Artesani Park is across the street and to the right.
item.how_to_find_us: Games will be at Artesani Park located off Soldiers Field Rd in Brighton, MA from 6:15 – 8:30 Wednesday Nights
item.name: Outdoor Summer Volleyball League 2012
